head.title: School Closure - Keys Public Schools

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

a.title: Parent notification letter regarding Hotline Contact
a.span: Parent notification letter regarding Hotline Contact

li.a: Parent notification letter regarding Hotline Contact

img.span: Keys Public Schools buildings and District Offices will be closed until further notice. Distance learning for all students is in effect.

br.br: We will be adhering to the directive of the State Dept. of Education and will be ceasing all academic operations until further notice.

br.span: : for UPDATE on School Closure and Distance Learning.
